**Server info**:
Shows The information about the server
Usage = mc!serverinfo
**Ping**:
Shows the ping of the Bot
Usage = mc!ping
**Report**:
Report a player with this command, aliases = r
Usage = `mc!report @user <reason with evidence>`
**Suggestion**:
Suggest something new to be added to the server, aliases = s
`Usage = mc!suggest <suggestion>`
**Nick request**:
Request a nickname change to the staff team
`Usage = mc!nickreq <name>`
